text.title: Build a Robot from Pipe Cleaners and Aluminum Foil

head.s: Build a Robot from Pipe Cleaners and Aluminum Foil

p.s: I grew up watching cartoons such as Voltron defender of the universe , Go-bots , Transformers , Gundam Wing and other types of shows .
There was something magical about watching these robots fight monsters and other robots .
And no matter if they were on earth or in space that seemed to capture the attention of young minds , and helped to cultivate a healthy imagination .
This page caters to those individuals who have maintained a youthful imagination , and want to know how to convert a thought into reality .
The instructions are simple , they are meant to serve as a compass to guide you to the finished product .
#The materials required for this is a roll of aluminum foil , pipe cleaners , and a good imagination .
( Scissors and markers are optional , but not required ) .
One thing to note here is that the time frame for creating this robot will vary based off of the time , and materials that are readily available to the individual making the model .

item.s: The most essential item anyone can ever bring to the table is a good imagination .
Create the concept for the root and also create a list the items that will be needed before hand .
Step two : Start connecting the pieces of pipe cleaner together .
They serve as the skeletal structure of the android so it is very important to ensure that each piece of pipe is firmly connected to each other .
You will want to create a firm silhouette before moving forward .
Step three : Begin the application of the first layers of aluminum foil to the silhouette .
If the android is to be stationary like a statue then there is no need to be concerned about covering up the joints or movable points of the creation .
If the model is to be pose-able then it is best to keep the free from any application of foil , since it would fall off due to repeated movement .
The amount of aluminum foil that can be used is at the discretion of the creator .
Applying multiple layers to the creation will allow it to be more durable .
Step four ( optional ) : apply color to the foil and apply the final layer of foil to the android .
Lastly is the creation of accessories for the model .
This is also a good time to create any accessories that would be appropriate for the model , not limited to , swords , shields , animal , or vehicle .
Step five : take multiple pictures and post them on your favorite social media site for your friends and can to admire your work .

Keep in mind that his is an awesome piece but pipe-cleaners rust so you will want to keep it out of water , and although it will be durable , it can still fall apart , so handle your masterpiece with care .
